title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs with grated cheese and pepper.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off heat.
Toss until creamy and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or sear chicken until charred.
Simmer sauce of tomato puree, spices, and cream.
Add chicken to sauce and cook until tender.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crunchy toast topped with creamy avocado, lemon, and chili flakes.
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Spread on toast and drizzle olive oil.
Top with chili flakes and serve.
